data.persona: I navigate the waters to import and export supplies. I also drive the ship when the king and queen must travel. I am responsible for keeping them safe.
data.description:
You are in the A battleship.
It is a glamorous wooden ship.  It glistens like there are diamonds encrusted on the hull.  There are ornate railings on the stairs as it is a massive boat.  There is even a sea monster on the bow, complete with jeweled eyes and gold hair.
There's some gold hair, some stairs, a hull, a deck, a sea monster, some jeweled eyes, some ornate railings on the stairs, x x, some ornate railings, and a steering wheel here.

You are carrying a telescope, wearing a ceremonial hat, some boots, and a linen tunic, and wielding a sword.

            "desc": "It is a glamorous wooden ship.  It glistens like there are diamonds encrusted on the hull.  There are ornate railings on the stairs as it is a massive boat.  There is even a sea monster on the bow, complete with jeweled eyes and gold hair.",
            "extra_desc": "This boat is abandoned.  No one has been able to board her for centuries and it is under suspicious circumstances that now it appears to have life aboard it.  People watch daily from the shore to see what look like little fairies buzzing all around and inside this ship.",

data.short_motivation: I want to climb the stairs to a high platform so everyone can see me.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give a long speech praising the king and queen.
data.long_motivation: I want to impress the king so he sponsors a trading voyage to distant lands.
